SEARCH
Package eu.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.annotations

Annotationsschnittstelle GeneratorFeature

@Retention(SOURCE) @Target({}) public @interface GeneratorFeature
Describes a feature supported by a code generator implementation.

This annotation is used within GeneratorFeatures to declare which annotations and specific attributes a generator understands. It allows the annotation processor to:

  • Validate user annotations against generator capabilities
  • Emit warnings or errors for unsupported attributes
  • Enable conditional generation logic

This annotation is intended for use by generator module authors, not application developers.

Example


 @GeneratorFeatures(
     generatorId = "aws-terraform-java21",
     supportedFeatures = {
         @GeneratorFeature(
             supportedAnnotation = Function.class,
             supportedAttributes = {
                 FunctionAttribute.NAME,
                 FunctionAttribute.TIMEOUT,
                 FunctionAttribute.MEMORY
             }
         )
     }
 )

  • Optionale Elemente - Übersicht

    Optionale Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Optionales Element
    Beschreibung
    Class<? extends Annotation>
    supportedAnnotation
    The annotation type supported by the generator.
    String[]
    supportedAttributes
    The specific attributes of the annotation that the generator supports.

  • Elementdetails

    • supportedAnnotation

      Class<? extends Annotation> supportedAnnotation
      The annotation type supported by the generator. This must be a class reference (e.g., Function.class).
      Gibt zurück:
      annotation class supported by the generator
      Standard:
      java.lang.annotation.Annotation.class

    • supportedAttributes

      String[] supportedAttributes
      The specific attributes of the annotation that the generator supports. Attribute names should be declared using constants (e.g. FunctionAttribute.MEMORY).
      Gibt zurück:
      array of attribute names
      Standard:
      {}
